#summary Load order of packages in Seaside 2.9
#labels Phase-Implementation

Details: http://www.lukas-renggli.ch/dropbox/seaside-2.9/seaside.svg

= Basic =
 * Seaside-Platform
  * Seaside-Tests-ANSI
 * Seaside-Squeak-Platform
  * Seaside-Tests-Platform
  * Seaside-Tests-Squeak-Platform
 * Seaside-Core
  * Seaside-Tests-Core
 * Seaside-Squeak-Core
  * Seaside-Tests-Squeak-Core
 * Seaside-Canvas
  * Seaside-Tests-Canvas (for defects see Issue 314)
 * Seaside-Session
  * Seaside-Squeak-Continuation (temporarily needed by Seaside-Tests-Session, see Issue 309)
  * Seaside-Tests-Session (for defects see Issue 316 and Issue 317)
 * Seaside-Component
  * Seaside-Tests-Component (for defects see Issue 318)
 * Seaside-!RenderLoop
  * Seaside-Tests-!RenderLoop (this is an essentially empty package with no tests)
 * Seaside-Environment
  * Seaside-Tests-Environment (for defects see Issue 319)
